content: It’s starting to feel more and more like the last “great” social network was Snapchat.¹ It was founded just over five years ago. And, of course, it just went public with over 150 million active users. There have been many other networks that have launched in the intervening years, and some have gotten some nice traction. But, at least in the U.S. market, it feels like the window is shut to reach such a massive scale.
